rukus.text: Mata kono Keisuke no naka de, iburahimu (no monogatari) o nobeyo. Hontoni kare wa shojiki-shadeari yogen-shadeatta
Kare ga chichi ni ko itta toki o omoe. `Chichiyo, anata wa naze kiki mo, mi mo shinaide, mata wazuka no eki o mo ataenai mono (bokuseki no guzo) o suhai nasaru no ka
Chichiyo, anata ga sazukatte inai chishiki ga, ima, tashikani watashi ni kudatta. Dakara watashi ni shitagai nasai. Watashi wa anata o tadashi michi ni michibikudeshou
Chichiyo, akuma ni tsukaete wa narimasen. Hontoni akuma wa jihibukaki okata ni taisuru muhon-shadesu
Chichiyo, hontoni watashi wa jihibukaki okata kara no chobatsu ga, anata ni kudaru koto o osoremasu. Sorede anata ga, akuma no tomo ni naru koto o shinpai shite imasu
Kare (chichi) wa itta. `Iburahimu yo, anata wa watashi-tachi no kamigami o kyohi suru no ka. Moshi sore o tomenainara, kanarazu anata o ishi-uchi ni surudearou. Sa towa ni watashi kara hanare sare
Kare wa itta. `Anata ni heian'are. Watashi no omo ni, anata no tame o yurushi o inoru. Hontoni kare wa, watashi ni taishi jihibukaku ara remasu

Watashi wa anata gatakara hanare, mata arra igai ni anata gata ga inoru mono kara hanarete, watashi no omo ni inorimasu. Watashi no omo ni o inori sureba, osoraku (omo no) onmegumi no nai me ni awanaideshou

Sore de kare (iburahimu) ga, kare-ra to arra igai ni kare-ra ga tsukaeru mono kara hanare satta toki, ware wa kare ni isuhaku to yaakobu o sazuketa. Soshite ware wa kare-ra o sorezore yogen-sha ni shita
Ware wa, kare-ra no ue ni jihi o tare, mata sukona shinjitsu o tsutaeru shita o sazuketa
